title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7041.1 - Policy and definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7041.1 - Policy and definitions

State Regulations
(a) Each local
correctional facility shall employ that number of persons necessary to provide
care, custody and control for all incarcerated individuals and to perform all
other necessary facility functions. In no case shall the number of such persons
able and present during a regularly scheduled shift be less than the required
post complement as determined by the State Commission of Correction in
accordance with the provisions of this Part. (b) As used in this Part, the term required
post complement shall mean the number of able staff necessary to perform
facility functions during each shift regularly scheduled within a 24-hour
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7041.1

Amended

New

York State Register March 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 11, eff. 3/19/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
